description:
'There isn't anyone who can take a hit from me. If there is, then it must be that I deliberately spare him.' – Liu Yun

'You pervert scum!' Rias Gremory pointed at Liu Yun's face.

'Beast!' Himejima Akeno tried to cover her naked body and cursed.

'My virginity!' Koneko softly sobbed.

'Oi, oi, Liu Yun, you must take responsibility... ' Fueguchi Hinami rubbed her pregnant belly.
